General.Name: Magnum Bhd
General.Description: Magnum Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the gaming business in Malaysia. It operates through two segments, Gaming, and Investment Holdings and Others. The company operates and manages a licensed four digit numbers forecast betting and its variation games. It provides property management services; and information technology services. The company was formerly known as Multi-Purpose Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Magnum Berhad in July 2013. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
